mapper.select: select d.id, d.name, d.cityId, d.dateCreated, d.dateUpdated from district d left join city c on c.id = d.cityId where c.`name` = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into district (id, name, cityId, dateCreated, dateUpdated) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dateCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into district
id,
name,
cityId,
dateCreated,
dateUpdated,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dateCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{dateUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update district
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cityId = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dateCreated = #{dateCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dateUpdated = #{dateUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
